Quick and tasty salad: South Indian recipeÂ  Servings: 3Â  Preparation Time: 5 mins Split green gram is one type of lentil, very low saturated and cholesterol. It's also good source of protein and vitamin C,K and B6 Today in my recipe I used split green gram with fresh coconut , carrot and spices. Let's start with Ingredients and procedure Ingredients: Split green gram - 1/2 cup Fresh grated coconut - 3 tb sp Fresh grated carrot - 2 tb sp Red chilly powder - 1/2 tb sp Chopped coriander - 2 tb sp Salt - to taste Lemon juice - 1/2 tb sp Procedure:
  • Wash twice and Soak split green gram for 6 hours
  • Add red chilly powder, fresh grated coconut , grated carrot, salt and coriander in a bowl
  • Mix them well
  • Drain water AndÂ Add soaked split green gram in bowl
  • Mix well and add lemon juice
  • Give it a mix and serve
  • Split green gram salad is ready to serve ðŸ˜€
